name: Men's Autism Awareness T-Shirt
description:
Courage, Love, Understanding, Patience, Truth, Hope...All things needed when raising or teaching a child with special needs.

As the mother of two children with autism, I wouldn't have made it this far without the tremendous understanding, patience and hope that my children's teachers and providers have shown. This shirt is a reminder that the journey through autism may be challenging, but overall it is rewarding.

In my search for answers, I stumbled across a great resource - OCALI, (Ohio Center for Autism and Low Incidence). This organization has been instrumental in supporting families throughout Ohio. A portion of the proceeds from sales of this t-shirt will go to OCALI, Ohio Center for Autism and Low Incidence to help fund their lending library or fund scholarships for their upcoming conference.

Give back to a great organization while showing your support for the epidemic of Autism in this high quality 100% cotton t - shirt. Designed by Blu Dot Group (bludotgroup.com)
